mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, user_regdate, user_flag) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{userRegdate}, #{userFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_pw AS userPw, user_name AS userName, email AS email, user_regdate AS userRegdate, user_flag AS userFlag FROM board.user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
